org.agilewiki.jactor2.metrics

Class MetricsTimerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.Timer
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.metrics.MetricsTimerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Counting, com.codahale.metrics.Metered, com.codahale.metrics.Metric, com.codahale.metrics.Sampling, MetricsTimer

    public class MetricsTimerImpl
extends com.codahale.metrics.Timer
implements MetricsTimer
    A metrics Timer, that also tracks failures.

        public static MetricsTimerImpl getMetricsTimer(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a Timer for the given class.

        It is recommended, for performance reasons, to only call this method once per each type/names pair.

        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        A Timer using type and names concatenated by periods as "name".
